import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"创建部署密钥"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/deployments/{deployment_name}/create_deploy_key"} context={"endpoint"} />

创建一个类似 &quot;dev:happy-animal-123|ey...&quot; 的部署密钥，可配合 Convex CLI 在该部署上进行开发或部署代码。

当通过 OAuth token 授予对该部署的访问权限时，此部署密钥将使用相同的 OAuth 授权 token。

当通过其他方式授予对该部署的访问权限时，则会创建一个新的 token，仅授予对该部署的访问权限。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"deployment_name","in":"path","description":"部署名称","required":true}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"部署密钥名称。"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"PlatformCreateDeployKeyArgs"}}},"required":true}} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["deployKey"],"properties":{"deployKey":{"description":"生成的部署密钥。","type":"string","title":"AdminKey"}},"title":"PlatformCreateDeployKeyResponse"}}}}}} />
